name: Frivolous Carnage
description:
Frivolous Carnage is a Top-Down Twin-Stick Shooter. 

The current game consists of a single mode with waves of zombies attacking the player. 

Use your gun, fire-rate upgrades, grenades and double-points pickups to kill as many zombies as you can and get as high of a score as possible. 

The game is endless so there are no level caps for the waves. Have fun!!

Controls text file located within the FrivolousCarnage.zip 

CONTROLS

Movement - Left Joystick / W-A-S-D Keys

Shooting - Right Joystick / Arrow Keys or (Mouse movement to Aim, Left click to Fire)

Grenade - X, Square / F Key

Turn Camera Left / Right - RB, LB, R1, L1 / Right CTRL, Num-0
